vote.title:
3. Agreement with Houston & Harris, PCS, Inc. to Provide Closed Circuit Television 
Inspection Services of the Sanitary Sewer System (Non -General Fund)
vote.description:
Department(s): Public Works Agency 
Recommended Action: Authorize the City Manager to execute an agreement with 
Houston & Harris, PCS, Inc. to provide closed circuit television inspection services 
of the sanitary sewer system for a three-year term beginning April 2, 2024 and 
expiring April 1, 2027, with a provision for a two-year extension, in a total amount not 
to exceed $4,000,000 (Agreement No. A-2024-039).
